Name: Blue Sentinel Tunic
Description: A steadfast blue tunic, empowering the wearer with unwavering resilience in the heat of battle.

Name: Blue Regal Robe
Description: An exquisite blue robe, donned by majestic sorcerers who command the mystic arts with elegance.

Name: Blue Knight Tunic
Description: A robust blue tunic, forged to withstand the relentless onslaught of enemy forces.

Name: Blue Arcane Robe
Description: A cryptic blue robe, wrapped in esoteric symbols that amplify the user's sorcerous might.

Name: Blue Wanderer Tunic
Description: A durable blue tunic, tailored for the dauntless adventurer who braves treacherous lands and mythical creatures.

Name: Blue Enchanter Robe
Description: A bewitching blue robe, permeated with the essence of a thousand ancient incantations.

Name: Blue Tempest Tunic
Description: A turbulent blue tunic, infused with the unrelenting force of a raging storm.

Name: Blue Mystic Robe
Description: A mesmerizing blue robe, attuned to the cosmic energies that fuel the tapestry of magic.

Name: Blue Aegis Tunic
Description: A stalwart blue tunic, designed to shield the bearer from even the deadliest of foes.

Name: Blue Lunar Robe
Description: A celestial blue robe, interwoven with the serene essence of the moon's ethereal glow.

Name: Blue Warlord Tunic
Description: An imposing blue tunic, worn by great conquerors who defy insurmountable odds.

Name: Blue Elemental Robe
Description: A volatile blue robe, bound to the primal forces that govern the elements of creation.

Name: Blue Valiant Tunic
Description: A heroic blue tunic, emblematic of the valiant champions who protect the realm from darkness.

Name: Blue Guardian Armor
Description: A regal set of blue armor, providing unwavering protection to stalwart defenders in their quest for glory.

Name: Blue Battleplate Armor
Description: A resilient blue battleplate, forged to withstand the mightiest of foes and imbued with the strength of a thousand warriors.

Name: Blue Arcanist Armor
Description: A mystical set of blue armor, crafted for the skilled arcanist seeking mastery over the arcane arts.

Name: Blue Crusader Armor
Description: A formidable set of blue armor, worn by valiant crusaders who pledge to protect the realm from malevolent forces.

Name: Blue Warden Armor
Description: An impenetrable set of blue armor, forged for steely wardens charged with the duty of safeguarding ancient secrets.

Name: Blue Vanguard Armor
Description: An audacious set of blue armor, embodying the ferocious spirit of the vangaurd who spearhead the battle.

Name: Blue Spellbound Armor
Description: An enchanting set of blue armor, imbued with the power to protect its wearer from sorcerous adversaries.

Name: Blue Royal Armor
Description: A majestic set of blue armor, tailored for the royal elite who navigate treacherous landscapes and intrigue with ease.

Name: Blue Reaver Armor
Description: A fierce set of blue armor, embodying the indomitable spirit of the reaver who fearlessly traverse uncharted territories.

Name: Blue Wizard's Armor
Description: A commanding set of blue armor, forged for victorious wizards who seek to expand their dominion by raising AP by 28 points.
